title: pati padam
sahitya:
pati padam paNivadu namadu kaDan pavam
 enum koDum veyilara nizhal tarum pashu 


anupallavi

  tudhi sheyum aDiyAr gatiyenum karuNA
nidhi vidhiyum ramApatiyum tozhum umA


caraNam    anna maya kOsha uDalenum kUNDil mannum uyirpparavai
 tannaik-kuri vaittu tennavan enum vEDan taruNam pArttirukkinrAn
 innal shUzhum minnal vAzhvu mudiyumun
